name: AFGBuildableRadarTower
comment: Radar Tower reveals nearby fog of war on the Map. Expanding over time until it reaches its max limit.

methods.name: GetCurrentExpansionStep
methods.comment: Returns a which step we are currently on, will never return higher than mNumRadarExpansionSteps

methods.name: GetNormalizedProgressValueForStep
methods.comment: Returns a normalized value for how much we will have revealed of the max reveal radius on a certain step

methods.name: OnRep_OnRadiusUpdated
methods.comment:
Broadcast that the radius of the radar tower have been updated.
If this is called from non game thread we schedule a call to be made on game thread.

methods.name: GetRevealRadiusOnStep
methods.comment: Returns how much we will have revealed on a certain step

methods.name: IsRadarExpandedToMax
methods.comment: returns true if this radar tower is expanded to it's maximum range

properties.name: mMaxRevealRadius
properties.comment: The reveal radius when tower have fully expanded its range

properties.name: mNumRadarExpansionSteps
properties.comment: Total amount of steps the radar tower have between Min Reveal Radius to Max Reveal Radius

properties.name: mCurrentExpansionStep
properties.comment: The step we are on right now between 0 and mNumRadarExpansionSteps-1

properties.name: mTimeToNextExpansion
properties.comment: Time left until we expand the reveal area
